attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If our country is to  consider an EU constitution Declaration, the Prime Minister should let the public decide by referendum, not take it on the word of the few. Too many decisions have been taken which are not in the publics interest, and without the voting public having their say. The Government will lose face if it is done behind our backs

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action and not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
